## About Abinash Senapati is a tech-enthusiast, an amateur sketch artist, and an open-source-coding enthusiast. A boy from the city of Bhubaneswar. He is currently majoring in Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering in Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. He also holds the position of Secretary Technology, Nehru Hall of Residence, IIT Kharagpur.
